meanings.sent1: She always presolves any issues before they become big problems.
meanings.sent2: He presolves his schedule for the week every Sunday evening.
meanings.sent3: The detective presolves the mystery before even arriving at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition presolves the outcome of the situation like a psychic.
meanings.sent5: Presolving the equation in math class made it much easier to solve.

meanings.sent1: The team presolves any conflicts before they escalate.
meanings.sent2: They presolve potential misunderstandings by communicating clearly.
meanings.sent3: The robot presolves errors in its programming to avoid malfunctions.
meanings.sent4: His foresight presolves problems before they even arise.
meanings.sent5: Presolving the issue saved them a lot of time and effort.
